What is the first step to participate in the Verus-Ethereum Bridge launch?
The first step to participate in the Verus-Ethereum Bridge launch is to download the latest Verus Desktop or Verus Mobile (available on iOS App Store or Android Play Store).

Title: How-to Participate in the Verus-Ethereum Bridge Launch
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a
Content:How-to Participate in the Verus-Ethereum Bridge Launch
This article gives instructions on how to use the Verus-Ethereum Bridge website and Verus Desktop and Verus Mobile to preconvert ETH, DAI and MKR into Bridge.vETH.First I recommend to read: Bridging Done Right — Verus-Ethereum Bridge Launches Now!
✅ We will show you:
How-to bridge ETH, DAI & MKR over to Verus
How-to enable vETH, DAI.vETH & MKR.vETH on Verus Desktop & Verus Mobile
How-to preconvert into Bridge.vETH with Verus Desktop & Verus Mobile
Download the latest Verus Desktop or Verus Mobile (iOS App Store or Android Play Store)
If on Verus Desktop make sure you are on native mode and fully synced. (And remember to always backup your wallet.dat file!)
Visit the Verus-Ethereum Bridge website here: https://eth.verusbridge.io/
Bridging ETH, DAI & MKR over to Verus
First thing we need to do, before we can preconvert, is to bridge over. To bridge ETH, DAI or MKR over you need to visit the bridge website here.Then connect your Metamask or WalletConnect wallet. Follow the steps they give you.Then fill in the address (R- or i-address) you want the bridged ETH, DAI or MKR to end up.
